item.title: Test-time Scaling of LLMs: A Survey from A Subproblem Structure Perspective
item.description: arXiv:2511.14772v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: With this paper, we survey techniques for improving the predictive accuracy of pretrained large language models by allocating additional compute at inference time. item.title: LiveCLKTBench: Towards Reliable Evaluation of Cross-Lingual Knowledge Transfer in Multilingual LLMs
item.description: arXiv:2511.14774v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Evaluating cross-lingual knowledge transfer in large language models is challenging, as correct answers in a target language may arise either from genuine transfer or from prior exposure during pre-training.
